Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/37th Place
ShortDescription: Southbound 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 35th, Wallace, Pershing, and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/37th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 35th, Wallace, Pershing, and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/37th Place.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
